ECE155: Engineering Design with Embedded Systems (Winter 2013)

Patrick Lam

Labs

  • Lab 0: Hello, Android!
  • Lab 1: Displaying Sensor Readings (assessment)
  • Lab 2: Using Accelerometer Readings to Count Steps (assessment)
  • Lab 3: Integrating Compass and Step Readings (assessment)
  • Lab 4: Navigation in the Real World. (assessment, provided Mapper utility code, simple peninsula map, map with islands)
